original_text: They were proud and they did whatever they wanted to do. When I saw the disgusting things that they were doing, I removed them.
korean_text: 거만하여 가증한 일을 내 앞에서 행하였음이라 그러므로 내가 보고 곧 그들을 없이 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: and they did whatever they wanted to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자기들이 하고 싶은 대로 했습니다

sentences.original_text: When I saw the disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 역겨운 것들을 보았을 때
